entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Border Style Setter does not set #11204
  • Changing `<DataTemplate/>` contents can give a runtime exception #11203
    Backlog
  • MAUI-Android-Release package compiled under W11 not working #11201
  • Auto size of grid columns to size of content #11173
    Backlog
  • Issues AMM0000 error in the AndroidManifest #11172

Closed

  • [Bug] Generated PNG images not displaying #10149
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Apps: Integrate API Controllers to fetch data offline via https://0.0.0.0/api/method calls from Javascript Frameworks #11033
  • Major change in Grids in latest .NET MAUI Preview #11162
  • Unable to access raw json asset file. #11143
    Backlog
  • Visual representation differs between platforms (a lot) #8954
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge net7 to main #11202
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11200
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, platform/android 🤖
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 6.0.10 to 7.0.0 #11197
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 6.0.10 to 7.0.0 #11196
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump MicrosoftExtensionsServicingPackageVersion from 6.0.1 to 7.0.0 #11194
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11193
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.10 to 7.0.0 #11191
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.Text.Json from 6.0.6 to 7.0.0 #11190
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 6.0.10 to 7.0.0 #11189
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 6.0.10 to 7.0.0 #11188
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 6.0.10 to 7.0.0 #11187
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 6.0.10 to 7.0.0 #11182
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions from 6.0.2 to 7.0.0 #11181
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump MicrosoftExtensionsPackageVersion from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11180
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump System.CodeDom from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0 #11179
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Ensure that UIScrollView ContentSize is set #11175
    area/layout 🔲, layout-scrollview

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22553.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22553.2 #11186
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.UI from 2.5.2.1 to 2.5.3 #11183
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.3.2 to 17.4.0 #11185
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [DevOps] Rename the xamarin-templates resource to yaml-templates. #11166
    community ✨
  • Ignore Authenticate Reunion NuGet sources - net7 #11150
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Extract Maps, Graphics & Foldable docs during build (#10909) #11142
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Run dotnet format on Microsoft.Maui.sln #11110
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
